description: Fort Arabesque Resort, Spa, & Villas promises tranquility and opulence with its 517 luxurious rooms, suites, private apartments and 65 villas. Four dining venues, five swimming pools, including a children's pool (three of which are heated), a state-of-the-art gym, world-class Thai-managed Spa and sports facilities as well as I-Dive, a five-star IDC PADI dive center, guarantee a fun and unforgettable hotel experience. Inspired by the Sardinian roots of its architects, Fort Arabesque Resort & Spa combines distinctive Italian and Arabic accents in its architecture, from its imposing medieval fort structure to its interior touches and décor, where the different shades of Egyptian cave stones from Aswan blend with the antique fine wood furnishings of oriental designs. We would like to introduce our new concept as well, which is unique in Egypt. Nestled within the Fort Arabesque resort, The Villas offer its guests luxurious accommodation, space and privacy in addition to a more personal and dedicated service. Each of the 65 Villas (40 units with 1 bedroom + 1 bathroom, 19 units with 1 bedroom + 1 bathroom with a sea view, 6 units with 2 bedrooms + 2 bathrooms) is tastefully decorated to reflect the mix of Arabic accents and Mediterranean influences of the Fort Arabesque Resort. All units have private garden and terrace with private access to a secluded swimming pool exclusive to The Villas. To ensure a fast and efficient service, the check-in is done through a private reception. The residents also have access to the Pavilion which is a private lounge where the villa guests can enjoy a semi-served upgraded breakfast in the morning. For lunch and dinner time the Pavilion functions as an A’la Carte Restaurant, giving the opportunity to enjoy a fine dining experience. The extra benefits of the Villa Guests include free Wi-Fi, free Gym usage and various discounts in the different outlets of the hotel. Guests at The Villas are free to use all the facilities and enjoy the same ‘all inclusive’ benefits at the resort with quick access to the main restaurant and the beach as well.

description: The Steigenberger ALDAU Beach Hotel is an exclusive luxury hotel built in fascinating Swahili architecture, situated directly on the beach at the southern tip of Hurghada with a spectacular view of the sea. The hotel is famous for its luxurious spacious rooms and superb restaurants, and it presents a variety of unrivaled features; from a unique Lazy River, inviting you to lose yourself in the tranquility of a gentle river ride, floating through the landscaped gardens until you disembark into an amazing pool covering 5,000 m3. A private beach that is almost half a kilometer in length, just to relax or to play, with "Ilios" the world class dive club and aqua center, where you can scuba dive, snorkel, go windsurfing, water skiing or parasailing. A 9 hole par 3 golf course, floodlit, for playing a challenging game of golf under the summer night sky. As for the feeling of complete well-being; immerse yourself in 1000 m2 of the "Planet Spa" for pampering body treatments.

description: Opening our doors for the first time in 2009, we have strived to become Luxury Adult Only Resort who is providing upscale hospitality from the heart. Through authenticity and care, we created unique memorable experiences for our guests that will be treasured for a lifetime. Over the past decade we have became destination of choice to our guests and will continue to do so for years to come. Our secret lays in our incredible team who put the soul in hospitality every day. The needs of our guests are in the forefront of everything we do. Located in Sahl Hasheesh on Egypt's Red Sea coast, an area made internationally famous by the combination of its clear skies, azure sea, and stark beauty of its desert mountains, Premier Le Rêve Hotel & Spa adds even more beauty to this work of art through its wonderfully landscaped grounds and elegant structures. Spend your vacation in luxury while enjoying the wonderful all year round weather and basking in the golden rays of the sun. This top-drawer hotel is a heaven for holidaying couples. It has its own private beach, a deluxe spa and a cluster of pools with sea views. Plus it’s adults-only, which means plenty of peace and quiet.

description: Highlights: • Family friendly resort with oriental flair • 400 m long private sandy beach • 1 buffet and 4 à la carte restaurants (unlimited visits) • Large gym with latest machine equipment • Access to facilities of neighboring sister hotel including Aqua Park in SUNRISE Garden Beach Resort Experience the Egyptian hospitality at the 5-star SUNRISE Mamlouk Palace Resort with the Arabian flair, a special family friendly atmosphere and hotel facilities. The private sandy beach offers relaxing hours directly at the Red Sea. A large variety of sports facilities including a fully equipped gym and CrossFit area, as well as a full-serviced spa (chargeable) will diversify your stay. Relax at one of comfortably designed 530 rooms & suites and enjoy the stunning pool areas the resort has to offer. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort and in all rooms. Every room has satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar with soft drinks, tea & coffee making facilities and much more. In SUNRISE Mamlouk Place Resort you can enjoy an all- inclusive dine around experience including 1 international buffet restaurant and 4 à-la-carte restaurants with Mexican, Asian, Indian and Spanish cuisine. In addition, the resort houses 7 Bars & Cafés: 2 Pool Bars, Beach Bar, Lounge Bar, a Shisha Tent, 1 club and a 24h Lobby Bar. For more choices and flexibility, guests can enjoy the all-inclusive facilities of the neighbouring sister hotel SUNRISE Garden Beach Resort, including the large Aqua Park for the whole family as well as 4 à-la-carte restaurants: Italian, Egyptian, Burger House, and Mongolian Cuisine. The SUNRISE Kid’s Club led by professional care takers is available for kids between 3-12 years old offering Daily Educational, Entertaining Sports & Activities. Located 19km (20 min) to Hurghada Centre and 15km (16 min) to Hurghada International Airport, the resort features a distinctive location. Our all-inclusive concept includes: Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner in Buffets or a la carte Restaurants (unlimited reservations). Snacks from 12:00-17:00, 22:30-01:00, local alcoholic Beverages from 10:00-00:00, Water and Hot Beverages 24/7, Minibar with water and soft drinks, Wi-Fi, free entertainment and sports activities, and much more. Some activities/services such as Diving Center, Spa Treatment are extra charge. Please get back to the hotel’s AI Formula for detailed information.

Being an Aqua Park, it is popular for its water slides, located on an area of 61.000 m2 varied swimming pools, besides a multiple range of sports and social activities for people of all ages Located only at 16 minutes from center of Hurghada and 10 minutes from the airport. Titanic Resort & Aqua Park offers all the comforts of a charming Red Sea resort with a unique combination of casual elegance and affordability. Titanic Resort & Aqua Park combines active and family vacation with an exquisite theme of water sports and leisure.

description: Highlights: • Luxury resort in Makadi Bay • Boho-chic architecture • Introduction of premium all-inclusive concept with à la carte breakfast, lunch and dinner • Swim-up and Jacuzzi rooms & suites • Royal club privileges, including restaurant, lounge & pool for suite bookers Located in the heart of Makadi Bay, the sea-front resort features an aesthetic, coastal design, with a set of unmatched, sophisticated facilities and amenities to enhance your vacation experience. Featuring the Premium All-Inclusive concept, guests are entitled to many additional amenities including serving sparkling wine upon arrival, daily mini-bar refill, and premium imported alcohol across selected outlets. Dine at one of the 3 premium à-la-carte restaurants with fancy à la carte breakfast, lunch and dinner, including International, Italian and Greek cuisine. Enjoy delicacies from the sea at Felucca Seafood restaurant (chargeable). In addition, the resort houses 8 Bars & Lounges with one F&B outlet operating 24/7. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort and in all rooms. The resort features a wide array of 240 rooms that define luxury and coziness to lay out the options of lodging befitting guests’ needs; including Superior and Deluxe Rooms, Jacuzzi and Swim-Up Suites, as well as Executive Pool & Jacuzzi Suites. Every room has satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar with soft drinks & beer, tea & coffee making facilities and much more. For guest seeking an extra outstanding experience, Tucana Resort offers “Royal Club Services” for suite bookers, which include: Limousine service, express check-in and check-out, in-room espresso machine, access to royal pool, lounge and restaurant with designated Royal Club Manager and more. Moreover, the resort grants you access to a huge aqua park with 18 different slides. In addition, the bay lies on the most beautiful snorkeling and diving spots, thus offers a unique exploring experience of the breathtaking underwater world of the Red Sea. Located 37km (40 min) to Hurghada Centre and 32km (33 min) to Hurghada International Airport, the resort features a distinctive location. Our premium all-inclusive concept includes: breakfast, lunch and dinner in a la carte restaurants (unlimited reservations),1 F&B outlet operating 24/7. 24-hours snacks, hot, cold, local alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks. Availability of fresh juices and premium & imported alcoholic beverages. Fruits & cookies upon arrival, daily minibar refill, tea & coffee making facilities with complimentary daily refill, daily turndown service, bathrobes & slippers, pillow menu (upon request). Wi-Fi, free entertainment and sports activities, and much more. Some activities/services such as Diving Center, Spa Treatment are extra charge. Please get back to the hotel Premium AI Formula for detailed information.

description: Rixos Premium Magawish Suites & Villas is the perfect destination for everyone traveling to Hurghada, Red Sea. Our premium ultra all-inclusive hotel offers you only luxurious suites and villas with beachfront accommodation, all with scenic views, flat TV, safe box, mini-bar (refilled daily), Espresso machine, pillow menu, bath amenities and much more. Elevate your experiences with direct access to the pools from all villas and some suites, also upon your request we have private beach and pool cabanas. Enjoy 1 km private sandy beach, 30 Swimming pools (heated in winter), ten bars, six a-la-carte restaurants (Turkish, Asian, Sea Food, BBQ, Brazilian and International), Rixy Kids Club, sports club and stunning spa. Entertain yourself and family with beach and pool activities, tennis courts, mini football, kids’ pools, modern fitness center, diving center, horse riding and more. Stay fit & healthy at “Exclusive Sports Club” with professional trainers for yoga, Zumba, aqua aerobics, dance lessons, pilates and cross-fit. “Rixy Kids Club” for your kids features master classes, craft room, mini disco, children’s cinema, playground and themed days. Indulge yourself at the stunning “Anjana Spa” with a variety of full body massage and care rituals performed by professional therapists, featuring Turkish hammam, private massage rooms, steam rooms, Jacuzzi and sauna, peeling and compresses, complex spa services, hairdresser and beauty salon. name: ZYA Regina Resort and Aqua Park Hurghada
aminities: ,Free internet,Pool,Fitness Centre with Gym / Workout Room,Free breakfast,Beach,Entertainment staff,Children Activities (Kid / Family Friendly),Kids club,Public wifi,Paid internet,Outdoor pool,Bar / lounge,Restaurant,Breakfast buffet,Poolside bar,Evening entertainment,Airport transportation,Shuttle bus service,Business Centre with Internet Access,Banquet room,Meeting rooms,Spa,Massage,Concierge,Shops,Sun umbrellas,24-hour front desk,Dry cleaning,Laundry service,Ironing service,Air conditioning,Private beach,Private balcony,Room service,Safe,Non-smoking rooms,Suites,Family rooms
description: We have been to Zya 2 times, in the beginning and in the end of our stay.   Breakfast: the buffet breakfast has a variety of options (sweets, different types of bread, vegetables, eggs, meat, omelette and crepes made at the moment, coffee and juices). The breakfast time is from 7 to 10 am and at 10 am they start already removing food and coffee machine, they were not very flexible although people were still eating.   Rooms: in our first stay we originally had reservation for a bungalow but when we arrived it was "upgraded" to a normal room with pool/sea view. The room was clean, with bottled water and clean towels. The safe in the closet was broken, but in the end there is no need to use it. Although it is stated that WiFi is not available in the room, we could reach it from the balcony or downstairs in the hall.  In our second stay we had a room with city view. We arrived in the weekend and there were more people compared to the first stay. So it was a bit noisy until 1 am.  The fridge and airco can also be quite noisy. In the morning the fire alarm rang (by mistake) and the staff started the room service before the check out time so they knocked our door while we were still sleeping.   Position: zya is in Sigala, on the main street full of restaurants and bazaars. From the hotel you can easily reach the marina (around 10 min walking). Hurghada old town is about 5 km (so we took a taxi).   Beach: we enjoyed our time at the beach,  we also rented masks for snorkeling (5 euro for 2 masks in total). Drawback:  The music at the beach at 11 am was very loud and we had to ask multiple times to switch it off.   Overall we paid around 22 euro per person per night so we believe that it is a very good deal considering that a 5-star hotel is much more expensive. ZYA is clean and quite comfortable so it is a good deal if you are willing to accept that it is not a fancy hotel.…

location: Hurghada - Safaga Road KM 32, Makadi Bay, Hurghada 84651 Egypt
description: Fort Arabesque Resort, Spa, & Villas promises tranquility and opulence with its 517 luxurious rooms, suites, private apartments and 65 villas. Four dining venues, five swimming pools, including a children's pool (three of which are heated), a state-of-the-art gym, world-class Thai-managed Spa and sports facilities as well as I-Dive, a five-star IDC PADI dive center, guarantee a fun and unforgettable hotel experience. Inspired by the Sardinian roots of its architects, Fort Arabesque Resort & Spa combines distinctive Italian and Arabic accents in its architecture, from its imposing medieval fort structure to its interior touches and décor, where the different shades of Egyptian cave stones from Aswan blend with the antique fine wood furnishings of oriental designs. We would like to introduce our new concept as well, which is unique in Egypt. Nestled within the Fort Arabesque resort, The Villas offer its guests luxurious accommodation, space and privacy in addition to a more personal and dedicated service. Each of the 65 Villas (40 units with 1 bedroom + 1 bathroom, 19 units with 1 bedroom + 1 bathroom with a sea view, 6 units with 2 bedrooms + 2 bathrooms) is tastefully decorated to reflect the mix of Arabic accents and Mediterranean influences of the Fort Arabesque Resort. All units have private garden and terrace with private access to a secluded swimming pool exclusive to The Villas. To ensure a fast and efficient service, the check-in is done through a private reception. The residents also have access to the Pavilion which is a private lounge where the villa guests can enjoy a semi-served upgraded breakfast in the morning. For lunch and dinner time the Pavilion functions as an A’la Carte Restaurant, giving the opportunity to enjoy a fine dining experience. The extra benefits of the Villa Guests include free Wi-Fi, free Gym usage and various discounts in the different outlets of the hotel. Guests at The Villas are free to use all the facilities and enjoy the same ‘all inclusive’ benefits at the resort with quick access to the main restaurant and the beach as well.

description: Royal Lagoons Resort and Aqua Park 5 minutes by free Shuttle Bus to Private Sandy Beach or 15 minutes’ walk to/from the beach. Ideally located on central Hurghada’s promenade and 10 minutes by car from Hurghada International Airport, The Royal Lagoons Resort boasts a private sandy beach along with 4 restaurants, 5 bars and an 04 outdoor Swimming pools. Featuring a balcony or terrace, the accommodations at Royal Lagoons Resort Hurghada include air conditioning, a minibar and a satellite TV. The bathroom is fitted with a bath or shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Savor gourmet Italian food at La Luna or enjoy international cuisine at the resort’s main restaurant Cascade. La Luna Italian restaurant requires booking 24 hours in advance and it is based on availability. Guests can unwind with a drink at the pool bar or beach bar where stunning views are offered. At an added charge, guests can make use of recreational facilities such as the health spa, where guests can request a massage or access the sauna, hot tub and steam room for a fee. There is also a gym and tennis court. This property is also rated for the best value in Hurghada! Guests are getting more for their money when compared to other properties in this

description: Aqua Blu Resort is a hotel with a lot to offer guests of all ages. The hotel has a quite location in the outskirts of Hurghada, where you can go by bus, taxi or the hotel's shuttle service if you would like to explore Hurghada. The hotel is located just a walk away from the sandy beach where you can snorkel or dive in the Red Sea. Sun loungers and parasols at the beach are free to use for the hotel guests. There are three buffet restaurants and six bars at the hotel, and All Inclusive is included for all hotel guests. The restaurants are serving dishes from the Italian, Oriental and Asian cuisine. There are also snacks and drinks included in between the meals. The pool area is large and contains of several pools for all ages. There is also a water park with water slides in the hotel area which all guests can use for free. There are sun loungers and parasols in the pool area and pool waiter service. Aqua Blu Resort is offering a lot of activities.

description: Highlights: • Luxury resort in Makadi Bay • Boho-chic architecture • Introduction of premium all-inclusive concept with à la carte breakfast, lunch and dinner • Swim-up and Jacuzzi rooms & suites • Royal club privileges, including restaurant, lounge & pool for suite bookers Located in the heart of Makadi Bay, the sea-front resort features an aesthetic, coastal design, with a set of unmatched, sophisticated facilities and amenities to enhance your vacation experience. Featuring the Premium All-Inclusive concept, guests are entitled to many additional amenities including serving sparkling wine upon arrival, daily mini-bar refill, and premium imported alcohol across selected outlets. Dine at one of the 3 premium à-la-carte restaurants with fancy à la carte breakfast, lunch and dinner, including International, Italian and Greek cuisine. Enjoy delicacies from the sea at Felucca Seafood restaurant (chargeable). In addition, the resort houses 8 Bars & Lounges with one F&B outlet operating 24/7. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort and in all rooms. The resort features a wide array of 240 rooms that define luxury and coziness to lay out the options of lodging befitting guests’ needs; including Superior and Deluxe Rooms, Jacuzzi and Swim-Up Suites, as well as Executive Pool & Jacuzzi Suites. Every room has satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar with soft drinks & beer, tea & coffee making facilities and much more. For guest seeking an extra outstanding experience, Tucana Resort offers “Royal Club Services” for suite bookers, which include: Limousine service, express check-in and check-out, in-room espresso machine, access to royal pool, lounge and restaurant with designated Royal Club Manager and more. Moreover, the resort grants you access to a huge aqua park with 18 different slides. In addition, the bay lies on the most beautiful snorkeling and diving spots, thus offers a unique exploring experience of the breathtaking underwater world of the Red Sea. Located 37km (40 min) to Hurghada Centre and 32km (33 min) to Hurghada International Airport, the resort features a distinctive location. Our premium all-inclusive concept includes: breakfast, lunch and dinner in a la carte restaurants (unlimited reservations),1 F&B outlet operating 24/7. 24-hours snacks, hot, cold, local alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks. Availability of fresh juices and premium & imported alcoholic beverages. Fruits & cookies upon arrival, daily minibar refill, tea & coffee making facilities with complimentary daily refill, daily turndown service, bathrobes & slippers, pillow menu (upon request). Wi-Fi, free entertainment and sports activities, and much more. Some activities/services such as Diving Center, Spa Treatment are extra charge. Please get back to the hotel Premium AI Formula for detailed information.

description: Seek out an outstanding experience and an unforgettable vacation at SUNRISE Crystal Bay Resort -Grand Select-. Nestled directly at a sandy beach with a private lagoon on the Red Sea, the 5-star deluxe resort comes with a wonderful garden surrounding and large pool areas including 3 pools and one jacuzzi pool. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort and in all rooms. The spacious 364 rooms at SUNRISE Crystal Bay Resort offer all the comfort and luxury you need for an unforgettable holiday at the Red Sea. Every room has satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar with soft drinks, tea & coffee making facilities and much more. For guest seeking an extra outstanding experience, SUNRISE Crystal Bay offers sea view suites, that can come with private Jacuzzi or pool area and royal club privileges. Experience culinary delights in the international restaurant with a daily changing theme buffet or dine at one of the 5 a-la-carte restaurants serving Mediterranean, Indian, Greek, Egyptian Cuisine (included in all-inclusive) and delicacies from the sea at Felucca Seafood restaurant (chargeable). I addition, the resort houses 9 Bars & Cafes: Pool Bar, 2 Beach Bars, Cocktail Bar & Lounge, Sports Bar, Shisha Cafe, Royal Club Lounge, a club and a 24h Lobby Bar. SUNRISE Crystal Bay Resort features a fully equipped gym, luxury spa & beauty salon (chargeable). The SUNRISE Kid’s Club let by professional care takers is available for kids between 3-12 years old offering Daily Educational, Entertaining Sports & Activities. Located 19km (20 min) to Hurghada Centre and 15km (16 min) to Hurghada International Airport, the resort features a distinctive location. Our all-inclusive concept includes: Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner in Buffets or a la carte Restaurants (unlimited reservations), Snacks from 12-17:00, 22:30-01:00, local alcoholic Beverages from 10:00-00:00, Soft and Hot Beverages 24/7, Minibar with water and soft drinks, Wi-Fi, free entertainment and sports activities, and much more. Some activities/services such as Diving Center, Spa Treatment are extra charge.

description: LABRANDA Royal Makadi is a perfect blend between elegance and uniqueness. It’s absolutely stunning setting in Makadi Bay, overlooking its own pristine private beach makes it as remarkable holiday destination. An endless variety of activities awaits with diving, water sports, snorkeling, kayak, canoes on the crystal blue waters and coral reefs showcasing the magical underwater world of the Red Sea. The rooms are contemporary with terraces overlooking the pools and gardens. LABRANDA Royal Makadi follows an extensive All Inclusive concept offering various dining options for lunch and dinner at Makadi Promenade. Makadi Promenade is located between LABRANDA Royal Makadi and LABRANDA Club Makadi and features amazing dining outlets such as the Greek “Taverna Paros”, the Cuban “Pequeña Habana”, the Rock & Roll Burger House, the Yum Asian Kitchen & Bar, the Oriental “Café Cairo” and the Gelateria “Giardino delle Rose” LABRANDA Royal Makadi itself has several classic resort-style amenities such as three adult size swimming pools and a children’s pool. Guests also have access to the resort’s gym, tennis courts, squash and archery range. The hotel was designed with families in mind. As a result, the dedicated kids' pool adds further value for families with toddlers. Additionally, the Resort has an active kids club. The latter is a place where children can take part in various other activities. Furthermore, LABRANDA Royal Makadi also has a conference room on request.

description: Egypt’s Red Sea is teeming with colourful sea life and unspoilt coral reefs. Its crystal clear waters and unique underwater gardens are globally renowned as an aquatic paradise for beginners and advanced divers. Spanning 48 acres on the Red Sea shore, our all suite hotel has been carefully designed to allow you space. It features high domed ceilings and is bathed in natural light; and dotted with traditional design elements; from the auspicious eight pointed star to neoclassic columns and handcrafted lanterns. Classical touches that add a distinctive sense of place. Opulent suites with unrestricted ocean views, international fine dining, water sports, and a range of PADI certified dives suitable for beginners as well as advanced divers. Coupled with our sincere hospitality and attention to your every need.

description: The Swiss Inn Resort is an art deco-styled resort hotel that stands on the shores of the beautiful Red Sea. The hotel has 401 rooms spanning three floors, and on-site facilities, include free Wi-Fi, conference/banquet facilities, tennis court, squash and gym. Rooms are equipped with air conditioning, tea & coffee making facilities, mini bar, and satellite TV. Several on-site restaurants and bars serve guests with local and international dishes and drinks. One of the hotel’s major attractions is the diversity of swimming pools and the idyllic location on the shores of the Red Sea. Commanding a perfect location by the Touristic promenade where everything is around. Swiss Inn Hurghada Resort is an oasis of relaxation, where you can enjoy the private sandy beach, Aqua play pool and an array of leisure facilities. Ideally overlooking the amazing Red Sea, Swiss Inn Resort is the right place for those who seek underwater exploration. The resort features private marina with water sports center offering variety of water activities as well as a fully equipped diving center. Indulge yourself with a relaxing massage treatment in the on-site spa offering sauna, steam, Turkish hammam and Jaccuzzi.

description: LABRANDA Club Paradisio El Gouna is an all-inclusive beachfront resort built along the nicest bay of El Gouna on the Red Sea coast of Egypt. A myriad of activities, cheerful entertainment, and friendly service characterize this comfortable retreat in a beautiful natural setting. A wide array of shopping, dining, and entertainment hotspots are found only a few minutes away in the colorful Downtown area and in the elegant Abu Tig Marina. Boasting an extensive choice of Club Rooms and Suites, the Labranda Club Paradisio accommodations are spread out in low buildings amid well-tended gardens. A 4-star Green Star Hotel certification attests to the hotel’s efforts deployed to preserve the environment. The club hotel welcomes children of all ages and is an ideal getaway for families. The Club Paradisio’s private sea beach borders one of El Gouna’s most beautiful bays. It boasts fine sand and turquoise water.

description: MinaMark Resort and Spa is located in Sakala area, downtown of Hurghada. It features 24 hours all inclusive meals, bright and modern rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, a private beach area, Aqua park and several restaurants. Rooms are equipped with air-conditioned, satellite TV and a minibar; safe box and coffee tray. the bathrooms are stocked with toiletries and a hairdryer. Some of the rooms overlooking sea and pool view, and others with a garden or city view. You can enjoy your breakfast, lunch & dinner from the best local and international dishes in a buffet style with theme variations on their menus each day. Guests can also choose from 3 high-quality a la carte restaurants. Italian cuisine can be sampled at the Piccola Italian Restaurant; Chinese dishes are served at YumYum Restaurant, while you can enjoy the catch of the day in the Sea bride restaurant whilst admiring beautiful sea view by the beach. Also don't miss the unique sushi taste at Ora lobby bar. You can enjoy some relaxing massages, treatments & Turkish bath in one of the best spas the downtown area, while the children are having fun in the Kids club or playground. The reception can gladly help the guest to arrange different activities, such as desert safaris, water sports or sea cruising. The famous “Mamsha” promenade is only 2 minutes’ drive away and the new Marina is a walking distance. Hurghada International Airport is 5 minutes' drive away from the hotel. Minamark Resort & Spa is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Hurghada, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay. Guests of Minamark Resort & Spa can easily experience some of Hurghada's most well-known attractions by Hurghada down town.

description: ALBATROS CITADEL RESORT SAHL HASHEESH! Heaven on earth! A Sunken Paradise Reborn! Our exclusive luxury architecture built with natural coral stones which has been hand chiseled from nearby mountains is a true architectural achievement. The Albatros Citadel Resort with an atmosphere of the ports in Southern France or the Amalfi coast embraces a large marina where you can enjoy a touch of a small Mediterranean village with its own harbor. Overlooking the Red Sea, each spacious and luxuriously appointed guest room features spectacular sea views. A unique holiday with water sports, boat trips, marina and private beach extended to 1.6 km long, 3 manmade sea lagoons inside an amazing house reef. Relax at the swimming pools elevated and scattered around for your convenience in the resort and enjoy our state-of-the-art health club and gym. Book a wellness journey with our team of professional in our on-site Spa. Conveniently located only 20 minutes drive from Hurghada International Airport.

description: The Stella Di Mare Makadi Beach Resort & Spa is located in the prominent Makadi Bay area, on Egypt's beautiful Red Sea Riviera. Makadi is a peaceful bay with many opportunities for snorkeling and scuba diving. The semi-tropical climate makes this both a summer and winter resort. With its warm, healthy climate and the beauties of the coral reefs, this is a place to delight sun seekers and water sports enthusiasts alike. Makadi Bay is a convenient 25km south of Hurghada International Airport. The location makes it easy to access the town of Hurghada, and there are many other notable places of interest nearby, such as the island of Giftun, which is a Marine National Park, where desert and marine life are protected by law. In fact, much of the Red Sea area has a protected status. The Stella Makadi Resort & Spa is situated on a white sandy beach, and has a spectacular house reef very close by, which guests may use for snorkeling. In addition to the natural beauty of its setting, the resort has the advantage of many facilities and services to ensure a holiday that offers a wide choice of activities. There is a Spa and Health club, a shopping mall and a discotheque, to name just a few Stella Makadi Resort & Spa guests are assured of dedicated service, with all their needs taken care of in a relaxed and enjoyable atmosphere

description: Fort Arabesque Resort, Spa, & Villas promises tranquility and opulence with its 517 luxurious rooms, suites, private apartments and 65 villas. Four dining venues, five swimming pools, including a children's pool (three of which are heated), a state-of-the-art gym, world-class Thai-managed Spa and sports facilities as well as I-Dive, a five-star IDC PADI dive center, guarantee a fun and unforgettable hotel experience. Inspired by the Sardinian roots of its architects, Fort Arabesque Resort & Spa combines distinctive Italian and Arabic accents in its architecture, from its imposing medieval fort structure to its interior touches and décor, where the different shades of Egyptian cave stones from Aswan blend with the antique fine wood furnishings of oriental designs. We would like to introduce our new concept as well, which is unique in Egypt. Nestled within the Fort Arabesque resort, The Villas offer its guests luxurious accommodation, space and privacy in addition to a more personal and dedicated service. Each of the 65 Villas (40 units with 1 bedroom + 1 bathroom, 19 units with 1 bedroom + 1 bathroom with a sea view, 6 units with 2 bedrooms + 2 bathrooms) is tastefully decorated to reflect the mix of Arabic accents and Mediterranean influences of the Fort Arabesque Resort. All units have private garden and terrace with private access to a secluded swimming pool exclusive to The Villas. To ensure a fast and efficient service, the check-in is done through a private reception. The residents also have access to the Pavilion which is a private lounge where the villa guests can enjoy a semi-served upgraded breakfast in the morning. For lunch and dinner time the Pavilion functions as an A’la Carte Restaurant, giving the opportunity to enjoy a fine dining experience. The extra benefits of the Villa Guests include free Wi-Fi, free Gym usage and various discounts in the different outlets of the hotel. Guests at The Villas are free to use all the facilities and enjoy the same ‘all inclusive’ benefits at the resort with quick access to the main restaurant and the beach as well.

description: The Steigenberger ALDAU Beach Hotel is an exclusive luxury hotel built in fascinating Swahili architecture, situated directly on the beach at the southern tip of Hurghada with a spectacular view of the sea. The hotel is famous for its luxurious spacious rooms and superb restaurants, and it presents a variety of unrivaled features; from a unique Lazy River, inviting you to lose yourself in the tranquility of a gentle river ride, floating through the landscaped gardens until you disembark into an amazing pool covering 5,000 m3. A private beach that is almost half a kilometer in length, just to relax or to play, with "Ilios" the world class dive club and aqua center, where you can scuba dive, snorkel, go windsurfing, water skiing or parasailing. A 9 hole par 3 golf course, floodlit, for playing a challenging game of golf under the summer night sky. As for the feeling of complete well-being; immerse yourself in 1000 m2 of the "Planet Spa" for pampering body treatments.

description: Opening our doors for the first time in 2009, we have strived to become Luxury Adult Only Resort who is providing upscale hospitality from the heart. Through authenticity and care, we created unique memorable experiences for our guests that will be treasured for a lifetime. Over the past decade we have became destination of choice to our guests and will continue to do so for years to come. Our secret lays in our incredible team who put the soul in hospitality every day. The needs of our guests are in the forefront of everything we do. Located in Sahl Hasheesh on Egypt's Red Sea coast, an area made internationally famous by the combination of its clear skies, azure sea, and stark beauty of its desert mountains, Premier Le Rêve Hotel & Spa adds even more beauty to this work of art through its wonderfully landscaped grounds and elegant structures. Spend your vacation in luxury while enjoying the wonderful all year round weather and basking in the golden rays of the sun. This top-drawer hotel is a heaven for holidaying couples. It has its own private beach, a deluxe spa and a cluster of pools with sea views. Plus it’s adults-only, which means plenty of peace and quiet.

description: Highlights: • Family friendly resort with oriental flair • 400 m long private sandy beach • 1 buffet and 4 à la carte restaurants (unlimited visits) • Large gym with latest machine equipment • Access to facilities of neighboring sister hotel including Aqua Park in SUNRISE Garden Beach Resort Experience the Egyptian hospitality at the 5-star SUNRISE Mamlouk Palace Resort with the Arabian flair, a special family friendly atmosphere and hotel facilities. The private sandy beach offers relaxing hours directly at the Red Sea. A large variety of sports facilities including a fully equipped gym and CrossFit area, as well as a full-serviced spa (chargeable) will diversify your stay. Relax at one of comfortably designed 530 rooms & suites and enjoy the stunning pool areas the resort has to offer. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort and in all rooms. Every room has satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar with soft drinks, tea & coffee making facilities and much more. In SUNRISE Mamlouk Place Resort you can enjoy an all- inclusive dine around experience including 1 international buffet restaurant and 4 à-la-carte restaurants with Mexican, Asian, Indian and Spanish cuisine. In addition, the resort houses 7 Bars & Cafés: 2 Pool Bars, Beach Bar, Lounge Bar, a Shisha Tent, 1 club and a 24h Lobby Bar. For more choices and flexibility, guests can enjoy the all-inclusive facilities of the neighbouring sister hotel SUNRISE Garden Beach Resort, including the large Aqua Park for the whole family as well as 4 à-la-carte restaurants: Italian, Egyptian, Burger House, and Mongolian Cuisine. The SUNRISE Kid’s Club led by professional care takers is available for kids between 3-12 years old offering Daily Educational, Entertaining Sports & Activities. Located 19km (20 min) to Hurghada Centre and 15km (16 min) to Hurghada International Airport, the resort features a distinctive location. Our all-inclusive concept includes: Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner in Buffets or a la carte Restaurants (unlimited reservations). Snacks from 12:00-17:00, 22:30-01:00, local alcoholic Beverages from 10:00-00:00, Water and Hot Beverages 24/7, Minibar with water and soft drinks, Wi-Fi, free entertainment and sports activities, and much more. Some activities/services such as Diving Center, Spa Treatment are extra charge. Please get back to the hotel’s AI Formula for detailed information.

description: Highlights: • Luxury resort in Makadi Bay • Boho-chic architecture • Introduction of premium all-inclusive concept with à la carte breakfast, lunch and dinner • Swim-up and Jacuzzi rooms & suites • Royal club privileges, including restaurant, lounge & pool for suite bookers Located in the heart of Makadi Bay, the sea-front resort features an aesthetic, coastal design, with a set of unmatched, sophisticated facilities and amenities to enhance your vacation experience. Featuring the Premium All-Inclusive concept, guests are entitled to many additional amenities including serving sparkling wine upon arrival, daily mini-bar refill, and premium imported alcohol across selected outlets. Dine at one of the 3 premium à-la-carte restaurants with fancy à la carte breakfast, lunch and dinner, including International, Italian and Greek cuisine. Enjoy delicacies from the sea at Felucca Seafood restaurant (chargeable). In addition, the resort houses 8 Bars & Lounges with one F&B outlet operating 24/7. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort and in all rooms. The resort features a wide array of 240 rooms that define luxury and coziness to lay out the options of lodging befitting guests’ needs; including Superior and Deluxe Rooms, Jacuzzi and Swim-Up Suites, as well as Executive Pool & Jacuzzi Suites. Every room has satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar with soft drinks & beer, tea & coffee making facilities and much more. For guest seeking an extra outstanding experience, Tucana Resort offers “Royal Club Services” for suite bookers, which include: Limousine service, express check-in and check-out, in-room espresso machine, access to royal pool, lounge and restaurant with designated Royal Club Manager and more. Moreover, the resort grants you access to a huge aqua park with 18 different slides. In addition, the bay lies on the most beautiful snorkeling and diving spots, thus offers a unique exploring experience of the breathtaking underwater world of the Red Sea. Located 37km (40 min) to Hurghada Centre and 32km (33 min) to Hurghada International Airport, the resort features a distinctive location. Our premium all-inclusive concept includes: breakfast, lunch and dinner in a la carte restaurants (unlimited reservations),1 F&B outlet operating 24/7. 24-hours snacks, hot, cold, local alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks. Availability of fresh juices and premium & imported alcoholic beverages. Fruits & cookies upon arrival, daily minibar refill, tea & coffee making facilities with complimentary daily refill, daily turndown service, bathrobes & slippers, pillow menu (upon request). Wi-Fi, free entertainment and sports activities, and much more. Some activities/services such as Diving Center, Spa Treatment are extra charge. Please get back to the hotel Premium AI Formula for detailed information.

description: Highlights • Located in the center of Hurghada • Situated on a private beach lagoon • Stunning sea view rooms • 2 buffet and 4 à la carte restaurants • Adults Only (16+) SUNRISE Holidays Resort (Adults Only) is a 5-star Resort in the centre of Hurghada. The adults-only hotel (16+) is situated on a private beach lagoon that enriches the rejuvenating holiday vacation with its idyllic sea view. The Resort comprises of 383 comfortable rooms with balcony or terrace. The stunning sea views rooms with the best views over the Red Sea, are set to keep our guests in awe. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort and in all rooms. Every room has satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar with soft drinks, tea & coffee making facilities and much more. The hotel offers 2 remarkable theme buffets. Guest can enjoy dinner at any of the 4 à-la-carte restaurants including Mediterranean, Egyptian, Diet & Light Cuisine or fusion cuisine in Nasaya Restaurant (chargeable). The adults- only Resort features 1 outdoor pool and jacuzzi pool, a private sandy beach lagoon, and a total of 8 bars. SUNRISE Holidays Resort features a fully equipped gym, spa & beauty salon (chargeable). Located 500m (10 min) to Hurghada Centre and 9km (14 min) to Hurghada International Airport, the Resort offers the best of both worlds: enjoying a relaxing and revitalizing atmosphere as well as experiencing the exciting nightlife of Hurghada. On-site parking is available free of charge. Our all-inclusive concept includes: Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner in Buffets or optional in a la carte Restaurants (1 free visit per week in each restaurant). description: Highlights • The first boho clubbing resort in the Middle East • Longest private beach on the Red Sea (2.6km) • Boho-inspired rooms and suites • Variety of bars, clubs, buffet and 8 à la carte restaurants (unlimited visits) • Adults Only (16+) To all stylish travelers with their seaside settings, laidback vibe and quirky, personalized preferences, Meraki introduces the first clubbing/boho resort in the Middle East with the biggest beach in the Red Sea; 2.6KM in the heart of Hurghada. The adults- only resort (16+) will capture the bohemian souls into an “all-in” experience, a 4-star resort with a 5-star service. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort and in all rooms. Stylish 368 rooms and suites are filled with truly bohemian style, in all kinds of ways. All Rooms come along with a bathroom with shower, a balcony or terrace and all amenities for a perfect holiday such as: Mini-bar, Sat TV, AC hair dryer and bathroom amenities. Various Clubbing themes within the Resort will ensure an all- round experience. With a large variety of Clubs, Pubs and Bars, the bohemian clubbing offers the perfect atmosphere for party seekers. Chill out Sanctuary areas are also available for those seeking for a relaxing day at the beach. The resort includes a total of 13 Bars, Clubs & Cafés: Vibe Club, Pub Fiction, Sports Bar, 4 Beach Bars, 2 Pool Bars, Latitude Bar, Shisha Tent, Beans n’ Cream Café and a 24-hour Lobby Bar. Experience tasteful meals in one of the 9 restaurants. Meraki Resort offers an all-inclusive dining experience including: 1 International Buffet Restaurant and 7 a la Carte Restaurants with Egyptian, Asian, Greek, Burger House, Pizzeria, Noodle and Gourmet Street Food Cuisine. For Seafood lovers, the resort offers the Felucca Seafood restaurant (chargeable). Meraki Resort offers a large private sandy beach with many party spots and sporting activities, including Beach Volleyball, Jungle Gym, Yoga & Pilates, an on-site diving center and much more. 3 pools, a fully equipped gym, and a full services spa & beauty shop (chargeable) will round up your stay. Located in Hurghada Centre and 13km (20 min) to Hurghada International Airport, the resort features a distinctive location. Our all-inclusive concept includes: Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner in Buffets or a la carte Restaurants (unlimited reservations), Snacks from 12:00-17:00, 22:30-01:00, local alcoholic Beverages from 10:00-00:00, Water and Hot Beverages 24/7, Wi-Fi, free entertainment and sports activities, and much more. description: Experience the beauty of the Red Sea at the Hilton Hurghada Plaza hotel, with scuba diving and a range of water-sport activities on the private beach and regular boat trips from the marina. Work out at the gym operating 24 hours a day, enjoy a game of tennis or simply relax with a drink at the swim up pool bar. Children will love the Clown-fish Aqua Park and dedicated kids' club. Only fifteen minutes' drive from Hurghada International Airport, the Hilton Hurghada Plaza hotel is ideally located next to the Hurghada City Centre Mall. Boasting a ballroom for up to 150 guests, the exclusive Anaconda Night Club, and wireless internet access throughout the hotel, Hilton Hurghada Plaza has facilities for all guests needs.

description: Highlights: • Family resort in Makadi Bay • Private sandy beach • 7 pools + aqua park (18 slides) • 1 buffet and 8 à la carte restaurants (unlimited visits) • Adults only designated area SUNRISE Royal Makadi Resort is the perfect place for a fun and relaxing holiday. The 5-star resort is located in the heart of Makadi Bay, a main region with the best diving and snorkelling areas. The resort is built on a serene landscape surrounded by lush gardens, seven magnificent pools and a large aqua park to keep you splashing at all times. Adults can enjoy adults- only designated areas on the beach and pool as well as 4 bars & clubs. Additionally, the large gym with latest machine equipment and the in- house spa are available for adults- only (16+). Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort and in all rooms. SUNRISE Royal Makadi Resort offers 465 rooms including family rooms with bunk beds or family suites with extra children's room. All rooms come with SAT LED TV, safe box minibar, tea & coffee facilities and a terrace or balcony. SUNRISE Royal Makadi Resort offers 1 international buffet restaurant and 8 à-la-carte restaurants: Italian, Mexican, Mediterranean, Bedouin, Asian, Steak and Roots Diet & Light Cuisine. The specialty Restaurant Felucca serving Seafood cuisine is available against extra charge. The resort offers 10 different theme bars including 4 Pool Bars, Beach Bar, Shisha Café, Victoria Pub & Aquarius Club (16+), 2 Lobby Bars, one operating 24h. The extensive pool areas feature 7 swimming pools, including children’s pool with multiple slides. Guests can exercise on the jogging track or at the well-equipped gym. For those who love an active holiday, the Resort features 3 Football Courts, Multipurpose Court, Volleyball Court and many other activities such as Evening Animation Shows, Amphitheatre, Aquarius Club with Resident DJ. The SUNRISE Kid’s Club let by professional care takers is available for kids between 3-12 years old offering Daily Educational, Entertaining Sports & Activities. Located 37km (40 min) to Hurghada Centre and 32km (33 min) to Hurghada International Airport, the resort features a distinctive location. name: ZYA Regina Resort and Aqua Park Hurghada
aminities: ,Free internet,Pool,Fitness Centre with Gym / Workout Room,Free breakfast,Beach,Entertainment staff,Children Activities (Kid / Family Friendly),Kids club,Public wifi,Paid internet,Outdoor pool,Bar / lounge,Restaurant,Breakfast buffet,Poolside bar,Evening entertainment,Airport transportation,Shuttle bus service,Business Centre with Internet Access,Banquet room,Meeting rooms,Spa,Massage,Concierge,Shops,Sun umbrellas,24-hour front desk,Dry cleaning,Laundry service,Ironing service,Air conditioning,Private beach,Private balcony,Room service,Safe,Non-smoking rooms,Suites,Family rooms
description: We have been to Zya 2 times, in the beginning and in the end of our stay.   Breakfast: the buffet breakfast has a variety of options (sweets, different types of bread, vegetables, eggs, meat, omelette and crepes made at the moment, coffee and juices). The breakfast time is from 7 to 10 am and at 10 am they start already removing food and coffee machine, they were not very flexible although people were still eating.   Rooms: in our first stay we originally had reservation for a bungalow but when we arrived it was "upgraded" to a normal room with pool/sea view. The room was clean, with bottled water and clean towels. The safe in the closet was broken, but in the end there is no need to use it. Although it is stated that WiFi is not available in the room, we could reach it from the balcony or downstairs in the hall.  In our second stay we had a room with city view. We arrived in the weekend and there were more people compared to the first stay. So it was a bit noisy until 1 am.  The fridge and airco can also be quite noisy. In the morning the fire alarm rang (by mistake) and the staff started the room service before the check out time so they knocked our door while we were still sleeping.   Position: zya is in Sigala, on the main street full of restaurants and bazaars. From the hotel you can easily reach the marina (around 10 min walking). Hurghada old town is about 5 km (so we took a taxi).   Beach: we enjoyed our time at the beach,  we also rented masks for snorkeling (5 euro for 2 masks in total). Drawback:  The music at the beach at 11 am was very loud and we had to ask multiple times to switch it off.   Overall we paid around 22 euro per person per night so we believe that it is a very good deal considering that a 5-star hotel is much more expensive. ZYA is clean and quite comfortable so it is a good deal if you are willing to accept that it is not a fancy hotel.…

location: Hurghada - Safaga Road KM 32, Makadi Bay, Hurghada 84651 Egypt
description: Fort Arabesque Resort, Spa, & Villas promises tranquility and opulence with its 517 luxurious rooms, suites, private apartments and 65 villas. Four dining venues, five swimming pools, including a children's pool (three of which are heated), a state-of-the-art gym, world-class Thai-managed Spa and sports facilities as well as I-Dive, a five-star IDC PADI dive center, guarantee a fun and unforgettable hotel experience. Inspired by the Sardinian roots of its architects, Fort Arabesque Resort & Spa combines distinctive Italian and Arabic accents in its architecture, from its imposing medieval fort structure to its interior touches and décor, where the different shades of Egyptian cave stones from Aswan blend with the antique fine wood furnishings of oriental designs. We would like to introduce our new concept as well, which is unique in Egypt. Nestled within the Fort Arabesque resort, The Villas offer its guests luxurious accommodation, space and privacy in addition to a more personal and dedicated service. Each of the 65 Villas (40 units with 1 bedroom + 1 bathroom, 19 units with 1 bedroom + 1 bathroom with a sea view, 6 units with 2 bedrooms + 2 bathrooms) is tastefully decorated to reflect the mix of Arabic accents and Mediterranean influences of the Fort Arabesque Resort. All units have private garden and terrace with private access to a secluded swimming pool exclusive to The Villas. To ensure a fast and efficient service, the check-in is done through a private reception. The residents also have access to the Pavilion which is a private lounge where the villa guests can enjoy a semi-served upgraded breakfast in the morning. For lunch and dinner time the Pavilion functions as an A’la Carte Restaurant, giving the opportunity to enjoy a fine dining experience. The extra benefits of the Villa Guests include free Wi-Fi, free Gym usage and various discounts in the different outlets of the hotel. Guests at The Villas are free to use all the facilities and enjoy the same ‘all inclusive’ benefits at the resort with quick access to the main restaurant and the beach as well.

Ideally located on central Hurghada’s promenade and 10 minutes by car from Hurghada International Airport, The Royal Lagoons Resort boasts a private sandy beach along with 4 restaurants, 5 bars and an 04 outdoor Swimming pools. Featuring a balcony or terrace, the accommodations at Royal Lagoons Resort Hurghada include air conditioning, a minibar and a satellite TV. The bathroom is fitted with a bath or shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Savor gourmet Italian food at La Luna or enjoy international cuisine at the resort’s main restaurant Cascade. La Luna Italian restaurant requires booking 24 hours in advance and it is based on availability. Guests can unwind with a drink at the pool bar or beach bar where stunning views are offered. At an added charge, guests can make use of recreational facilities such as the health spa, where guests can request a massage or access the sauna, hot tub and steam room for a fee. There is also a gym and tennis court. This property is also rated for the best value in Hurghada! Guests are getting more for their money when compared to other properties in this

description: Rixos Premium Magawish Suites & Villas is the perfect destination for everyone traveling to Hurghada, Red Sea. Our premium ultra all-inclusive hotel offers you only luxurious suites and villas with beachfront accommodation, all with scenic views, flat TV, safe box, mini-bar (refilled daily), Espresso machine, pillow menu, bath amenities and much more. Elevate your experiences with direct access to the pools from all villas and some suites, also upon your request we have private beach and pool cabanas. Enjoy 1 km private sandy beach, 30 Swimming pools (heated in winter), ten bars, six a-la-carte restaurants (Turkish, Asian, Sea Food, BBQ, Brazilian and International), Rixy Kids Club, sports club and stunning spa. Entertain yourself and family with beach and pool activities, tennis courts, mini football, kids’ pools, modern fitness center, diving center, horse riding and more. Stay fit & healthy at “Exclusive Sports Club” with professional trainers for yoga, Zumba, aqua aerobics, dance lessons, pilates and cross-fit. “Rixy Kids Club” for your kids features master classes, craft room, mini disco, children’s cinema, playground and themed days. Indulge yourself at the stunning “Anjana Spa” with a variety of full body massage and care rituals performed by professional therapists, featuring Turkish hammam, private massage rooms, steam rooms, Jacuzzi and sauna, peeling and compresses, complex spa services, hairdresser and beauty salon. Only 7 km away from Hurghada international airport.

location: Gabal El Hareem Main Street, Hurghada Egypt
description: Experience the beauty of the Red Sea at the Hilton Hurghada Plaza hotel, with scuba diving and a range of water-sport activities on the private beach and regular boat trips from the marina. Work out at the gym operating 24 hours a day, enjoy a game of tennis or simply relax with a drink at the swim up pool bar. Children will love the Clown-fish Aqua Park and dedicated kids' club. Savour fresh flavours for dinner at the beachfront Lophelia Seafood Restaurant, with panoramic views of the Red Sea. Sip drinks at sunset on the beach of Hilton Hurghada Plaza, or enjoy a relaxing day at the spa, complete with extensive treatments and Turkish bath. From Hilton Guest Rooms to private Suites and multi-story Duplexes, all Hilton Hurghada Plaza hotel rooms boast stunning views of the Red Sea, combined with complimentary wireless internet access. Only fifteen minutes' drive from Hurghada International Airport, the Hilton Hurghada Plaza hotel is ideally located next to the Hurghada City Centre Mall. Boasting a ballroom for up to 150 guests, the exclusive Anaconda Night Club, and wireless internet access throughout the hotel, Hilton Hurghada Plaza has facilities for all guests needs.

description: Highlights: • Luxury resort in Makadi Bay • Boho-chic architecture • Introduction of premium all-inclusive concept with à la carte breakfast, lunch and dinner • Swim-up and Jacuzzi rooms & suites • Royal club privileges, including restaurant, lounge & pool for suite bookers Located in the heart of Makadi Bay, the sea-front resort features an aesthetic, coastal design, with a set of unmatched, sophisticated facilities and amenities to enhance your vacation experience. Featuring the Premium All-Inclusive concept, guests are entitled to many additional amenities including serving sparkling wine upon arrival, daily mini-bar refill, and premium imported alcohol across selected outlets. Dine at one of the 3 premium à-la-carte restaurants with fancy à la carte breakfast, lunch and dinner, including International, Italian and Greek cuisine. Enjoy delicacies from the sea at Felucca Seafood restaurant (chargeable). In addition, the resort houses 8 Bars & Lounges with one F&B outlet operating 24/7. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort and in all rooms. The resort features a wide array of 240 rooms that define luxury and coziness to lay out the options of lodging befitting guests’ needs; including Superior and Deluxe Rooms, Jacuzzi and Swim-Up Suites, as well as Executive Pool & Jacuzzi Suites. Every room has satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar with soft drinks & beer, tea & coffee making facilities and much more. For guest seeking an extra outstanding experience, Tucana Resort offers “Royal Club Services” for suite bookers, which include: Limousine service, express check-in and check-out, in-room espresso machine, access to royal pool, lounge and restaurant with designated Royal Club Manager and more. Moreover, the resort grants you access to a huge aqua park with 18 different slides. In addition, the bay lies on the most beautiful snorkeling and diving spots, thus offers a unique exploring experience of the breathtaking underwater world of the Red Sea. Located 37km (40 min) to Hurghada Centre and 32km (33 min) to Hurghada International Airport, the resort features a distinctive location. Our premium all-inclusive concept includes: breakfast, lunch and dinner in a la carte restaurants (unlimited reservations),1 F&B outlet operating 24/7. 24-hours snacks, hot, cold, local alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks. Availability of fresh juices and premium & imported alcoholic beverages. Fruits & cookies upon arrival, daily minibar refill, tea & coffee making facilities with complimentary daily refill, daily turndown service, bathrobes & slippers, pillow menu (upon request). Wi-Fi, free entertainment and sports activities, and much more. Some activities/services such as Diving Center, Spa Treatment are extra charge. Please get back to the hotel Premium AI Formula for detailed information.

description: Seek out an outstanding experience and an unforgettable vacation at SUNRISE Crystal Bay Resort -Grand Select-. Nestled directly at a sandy beach with a private lagoon on the Red Sea, the 5-star deluxe resort comes with a wonderful garden surrounding and large pool areas including 3 pools and one jacuzzi pool. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort and in all rooms. The spacious 364 rooms at SUNRISE Crystal Bay Resort offer all the comfort and luxury you need for an unforgettable holiday at the Red Sea. Every room has satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar with soft drinks, tea & coffee making facilities and much more. For guest seeking an extra outstanding experience, SUNRISE Crystal Bay offers sea view suites, that can come with private Jacuzzi or pool area and royal club privileges. Experience culinary delights in the international restaurant with a daily changing theme buffet or dine at one of the 5 a-la-carte restaurants serving Mediterranean, Indian, Greek, Egyptian Cuisine (included in all-inclusive) and delicacies from the sea at Felucca Seafood restaurant (chargeable). I addition, the resort houses 9 Bars & Cafes: Pool Bar, 2 Beach Bars, Cocktail Bar & Lounge, Sports Bar, Shisha Cafe, Royal Club Lounge, a club and a 24h Lobby Bar. SUNRISE Crystal Bay Resort features a fully equipped gym, luxury spa & beauty salon (chargeable). The SUNRISE Kid’s Club let by professional care takers is available for kids between 3-12 years old offering Daily Educational, Entertaining Sports & Activities. Located 19km (20 min) to Hurghada Centre and 15km (16 min) to Hurghada International Airport, the resort features a distinctive location. description: LABRANDA Royal Makadi is a perfect blend between elegance and uniqueness. It’s absolutely stunning setting in Makadi Bay, overlooking its own pristine private beach makes it as remarkable holiday destination. An endless variety of activities awaits with diving, water sports, snorkeling, kayak, canoes on the crystal blue waters and coral reefs showcasing the magical underwater world of the Red Sea. The rooms are contemporary with terraces overlooking the pools and gardens. LABRANDA Royal Makadi follows an extensive All Inclusive concept offering various dining options for lunch and dinner at Makadi Promenade. Makadi Promenade is located between LABRANDA Royal Makadi and LABRANDA Club Makadi and features amazing dining outlets such as the Greek “Taverna Paros”, the Cuban “Pequeña Habana”, the Rock & Roll Burger House, the Yum Asian Kitchen & Bar, the Oriental “Café Cairo” and the Gelateria “Giardino delle Rose” LABRANDA Royal Makadi itself has several classic resort-style amenities such as three adult size swimming pools and a children’s pool. Guests also have access to the resort’s gym, tennis courts, squash and archery range. The hotel was designed with families in mind. As a result, the dedicated kids' pool adds further value for families with toddlers. Additionally, the Resort has an active kids club. The latter is a place where children can take part in various other activities. Furthermore, LABRANDA Royal Makadi also has a conference room on request.

Commanding a perfect location by the Touristic promenade where everything is around. Swiss Inn Hurghada Resort is an oasis of relaxation, where you can enjoy the private sandy beach, Aqua play pool and an array of leisure facilities. Ideally overlooking the amazing Red Sea, Swiss Inn Resort is the right place for those who seek underwater exploration. The resort features private marina with water sports center offering variety of water activities as well as a fully equipped diving center. Indulge yourself with a relaxing massage treatment in the on-site spa offering sauna, steam, Turkish hammam and Jaccuzzi.

description: LABRANDA Club Paradisio El Gouna is an all-inclusive beachfront resort built along the nicest bay of El Gouna on the Red Sea coast of Egypt. A myriad of activities, cheerful entertainment, and friendly service characterize this comfortable retreat in a beautiful natural setting. A wide array of shopping, dining, and entertainment hotspots are found only a few minutes away in the colorful Downtown area and in the elegant Abu Tig Marina. Boasting an extensive choice of Club Rooms and Suites, the Labranda Club Paradisio accommodations are spread out in low buildings amid well-tended gardens. A 4-star Green Star Hotel certification attests to the hotel’s efforts deployed to preserve the environment. The club hotel welcomes children of all ages and is an ideal getaway for families. The Club Paradisio’s private sea beach borders one of El Gouna’s most beautiful bays. It boasts fine sand and turquoise water.

description: MinaMark Resort and Spa is located in Sakala area, downtown of Hurghada. It features 24 hours all inclusive meals, bright and modern rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, a private beach area, Aqua park and several restaurants. Rooms are equipped with air-conditioned, satellite TV and a minibar; safe box and coffee tray. the bathrooms are stocked with toiletries and a hairdryer. Some of the rooms overlooking sea and pool view, and others with a garden or city view. You can enjoy your breakfast, lunch & dinner from the best local and international dishes in a buffet style with theme variations on their menus each day. Guests can also choose from 3 high-quality a la carte restaurants. Italian cuisine can be sampled at the Piccola Italian Restaurant; Chinese dishes are served at YumYum Restaurant, while you can enjoy the catch of the day in the Sea bride restaurant whilst admiring beautiful sea view by the beach. Also don't miss the unique sushi taste at Ora lobby bar. You can enjoy some relaxing massages, treatments & Turkish bath in one of the best spas the downtown area, while the children are having fun in the Kids club or playground. The reception can gladly help the guest to arrange different activities, such as desert safaris, water sports or sea cruising. The famous “Mamsha” promenade is only 2 minutes’ drive away and the new Marina is a walking distance. Hurghada International Airport is 5 minutes' drive away from the hotel. Minamark Resort & Spa is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Hurghada, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay. Guests of Minamark Resort & Spa can easily experience some of Hurghada's most well-known attractions by Hurghada down town.

description: ALBATROS CITADEL RESORT SAHL HASHEESH! Heaven on earth! A Sunken Paradise Reborn! Our exclusive luxury architecture built with natural coral stones which has been hand chiseled from nearby mountains is a true architectural achievement. The Albatros Citadel Resort with an atmosphere of the ports in Southern France or the Amalfi coast embraces a large marina where you can enjoy a touch of a small Mediterranean village with its own harbor. Overlooking the Red Sea, each spacious and luxuriously appointed guest room features spectacular sea views. A unique holiday with water sports, boat trips, marina and private beach extended to 1.6 km long, 3 manmade sea lagoons inside an amazing house reef. Relax at the swimming pools elevated and scattered around for your convenience in the resort and enjoy our state-of-the-art health club and gym. Book a wellness journey with our team of professional in our on-site Spa. Conveniently located only 20 minutes drive from Hurghada International Airport.

description: The Stella Di Mare Makadi Beach Resort & Spa is located in the prominent Makadi Bay area, on Egypt's beautiful Red Sea Riviera. Makadi is a peaceful bay with many opportunities for snorkeling and scuba diving. The semi-tropical climate makes this both a summer and winter resort. With its warm, healthy climate and the beauties of the coral reefs, this is a place to delight sun seekers and water sports enthusiasts alike. Makadi Bay is a convenient 25km south of Hurghada International Airport. The location makes it easy to access the town of Hurghada, and there are many other notable places of interest nearby, such as the island of Giftun, which is a Marine National Park, where desert and marine life are protected by law. In fact, much of the Red Sea area has a protected status. The Stella Makadi Resort & Spa is situated on a white sandy beach, and has a spectacular house reef very close by, which guests may use for snorkeling. In addition to the natural beauty of its setting, the resort has the advantage of many facilities and services to ensure a holiday that offers a wide choice of activities. There is a Spa and Health club, a shopping mall and a discotheque, to name just a few Stella Makadi Resort & Spa guests are assured of dedicated service, with all their needs taken care of in a relaxed and enjoyable atmosphere

description: This Red Sea oasis houses 100 rooms in buildings that are intricately designed with detailed arches. From standard rooms to villas with their own private pool, Casa Cook El Gouna welcomes guests on a bed and breakfast or half-board basis in a family-friendly atmosphere without compromising privacy and seclusion. The fifth award-winning collection of boutique hotels, features earthy grey tones and raw wooden furniture to create a cozy atmosphere. For added relaxation, guests can lounge by the serene pool and unwind with chill-out beats in the background. Guests can also pamper themselves at the available spa with its invigorating offerings. Proving to be an ideal destination for all types of travelers, Casa Cook El Gouna also provides the perfect backdrops and amenities for kitesurfing events and product launches as well as equipped meeting and co-working spaces. The hotel accepts children from 16 years old and above.

description: GOLDEN BEACH Resort - Hurghada is located in a quiet location northwest of Hurghada directly on a wide and beautiful beach (bathing shoes recommended). El Gouna is approx 10Km away, and the center of Hurghada is approx. 15Km. To the International airport it is 20 m. GOLDEN BEACH Resort - Hurghada is consists of a main building and several adjoining buildings, lay in a lush palm tree garden with many exotic trees. A great choice for a beach vacation - specially for families (shallow water).Divers appreciate the diving center and Kite Surfers the Kite Station which are located in the hotel premises. The popular hotel complex features an attractive pool area with a 200 meter long ʺlazy riverʺ, one of the largest amphitheaters in the red sea and many sport facilities. The resort offers different types of comfortable accommodation (in total 435 spacious rooms) such as family rooms, double rooms with and without sea view as well as superior rooms. All rooms are equipped with air conditioning, telephone, TV, hairdryer, Safe Box (free) and Mini Bar. The resort provides multiple choice of pools, 11 in total: Relax pool, Adults only pool, 2 separate Kid’s pool, 2 pools connected by an artificial river leading from the main building to the beach and the Golden Beach Aqua Park with 11 Water slides + 4 small slides for smaller children.

description: Fort Arabesque Resort, Spa, & Villas promises tranquility and opulence with its 517 luxurious rooms, suites, private apartments and 65 villas. Four dining venues, five swimming pools, including a children's pool (three of which are heated), a state-of-the-art gym, world-class Thai-managed Spa and sports facilities as well as I-Dive, a five-star IDC PADI dive center, guarantee a fun and unforgettable hotel experience. Inspired by the Sardinian roots of its architects, Fort Arabesque Resort & Spa combines distinctive Italian and Arabic accents in its architecture, from its imposing medieval fort structure to its interior touches and décor, where the different shades of Egyptian cave stones from Aswan blend with the antique fine wood furnishings of oriental designs. We would like to introduce our new concept as well, which is unique in Egypt. Nestled within the Fort Arabesque resort, The Villas offer its guests luxurious accommodation, space and privacy in addition to a more personal and dedicated service. Each of the 65 Villas (40 units with 1 bedroom + 1 bathroom, 19 units with 1 bedroom + 1 bathroom with a sea view, 6 units with 2 bedrooms + 2 bathrooms) is tastefully decorated to reflect the mix of Arabic accents and Mediterranean influences of the Fort Arabesque Resort. All units have private garden and terrace with private access to a secluded swimming pool exclusive to The Villas. To ensure a fast and efficient service, the check-in is done through a private reception. The residents also have access to the Pavilion which is a private lounge where the villa guests can enjoy a semi-served upgraded breakfast in the morning. For lunch and dinner time the Pavilion functions as an A’la Carte Restaurant, giving the opportunity to enjoy a fine dining experience. The extra benefits of the Villa Guests include free Wi-Fi, free Gym usage and various discounts in the different outlets of the hotel. Guests at The Villas are free to use all the facilities and enjoy the same ‘all inclusive’ benefits at the resort with quick access to the main restaurant and the beach as well.

description: SUNRISE Garden Beach Resort is an elegant 5-star resort situated directly by a private sandy beach on an extensive garden landscape. Families can enjoy their time at the Aqua Park and the Family Pool, while couples and friends can relax at the "Adults Only” area by the beach or enjoy the day at the full- serviced spa (chargeable). SUNRISE Garden Beach Resort welcomes you to a world of fun, and exciting activities. The resort has developed a strong sports concept. At the all-inclusive resort, you have the opportunity to supplement sun and relaxation with a wide range of activities suitable for the whole family including fully equipped 400qm gym with the latest machine equipment and weights & a large cross fit area, 11-man football pitch, tennis courts, spinning classes, archery, swimming courses of 25 meters in saltwater in one of the lagoons at the beach and much more. The Resort comprises of 481 comfortable rooms, including family rooms & suites with balcony or terrace. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort and in all rooms. Every room has satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar with soft drinks, tea & coffee making facilities and much more. The resort offers an all- inclusive dine around experience with a wide selection of exquisite dining options including 1 international buffet restaurant and 4 à-la-carte restaurants: Italian, Egyptian, Burger House, and Mongolian Cuisine. The specialty Restaurant Nasaya serving Fusion cuisine is available against extra charge. I addition, the resort houses 8 Bars & Cafés: 2 Pool Bars, Beach Bar, Adults-Only Bar, Billiard Bar, a Shisha Tent, 1 pub and a 24h Lobby Bar. For more choices and flexibility, guests can enjoy the all-inclusive facilities of the neighbouring sister hotel SENTIDO Mamlouk Palace Resort, including 3 à-la-carte restaurants with Mexican, Asian and Spanish cuisine. The SUNRISE Kid’s Club let by professional care takers is available for kids between 3-12 years old offering Daily Educational, Entertaining Sports & Activities. The breathless sunset, the fascinating views of the desert and mountains, and the turquoise waters of the beaches combined with excellent service will leave our guests with unforgettable joyful memories. Located 19km (20 min) to Hurghada Centre and 15km (16 min) to Hurghada International Airport, the Resort features a distinctive location. Our all-inclusive concept includes: Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner in Buffets or a la carte Restaurants (unlimited reservations). Snacks from 12-17:00, 22:30-01:00, local alcoholic Beverages from 10:00-00:00, Water and Hot Beverages 24/7, Minibar with water and soft drinks, Wi-Fi, free entertainment and sports activities, and much more. Some activities/services such as Diving Center, Spa Treatment are extra charge.

description: Welcome to Beach Albatros Resort Beach Albatros Resort is a luxurious hideaway where visitors can relax and enjoy the marvels of the Red Sea with summer weather all year round. Beachfront, all inclusive resort is surrounded with 123,000 m² of landscaped gardens with sparkling pools and the crystal blue sea. It is only 15 minutes far from Hurghada Airport and 20 minutes from the city center. Beach Albatros Resort is a pond-like picture of blue-green tranquility, perfect for windsurfing, kayaking, and other water sports. Its gentle waves and shallow waters make bathing safe for children and adults alike. Its long beach is perfect for jogging or long walks at sunrise or sundown.

description: Ancient Sands Resort is the PLACE to BE on Egypt's Red Sea Riviera. The resort in El Gouna contains over 80 apartment suites offering guests a relaxed alternative to more traditional styles of hotel accommodation plus 56 Deluxe hotel rooms. Lush landscaping surrounds the suites at Ancient Sands to provide a tropical paradise amidst the desert. The apartment suites themselves provide fitted kitchens, private living areas with en suite bathrooms and fantastic terraces overlooking the exceptional views. The suites range from one to three bedrooms providing an ideal option for any situation whether an individual traveler, couple, family or group of friends. The popular Piazza Restaurant offering an international cuisine is at the heart of the resort and open for lunch, while the newly opened Crumbs Café offers freshly baked bread, roasted coffees and patisserie to enjoy. Ancient Sands Resort provides a homely yet luxurious holiday accommodation in El Gouna, providing access to the best the Red Sea has to offer from diving to beaches, water sports to nightlife.

description: AMC Royal Hotel & Spa is a 5 stars Resort that consists of 395 rooms in 2 wings (1-5 floors) and the main building. The resort is situated on the sandy beach of the Red Sea only 11 km north of Hurghada and 13 km south of El Gouna. The resort overlooks its own spacious private beach, offering a paradise for holiday makers: sun, sand and sea. The resort is an all-inclusive property offering full board accommodation except for lobster and shrimp items. All local drinks (soft and alcoholic) are also included as well as non-motorized sports.
